title: DoD Confirms US-Trained Fighters in Syria Gave Arms to Nusra Front Militants
content:
A spokesman for the Pentagon has confirmed that Syrian rebel fighters trained by the United States provided ammunition and equipment to an al-Qaeda-linked group. 
View full post on Infowars 
 
The post DoD Confirms US-Trained Fighters in Syria Gave Arms to Nusra Front Militants appeared first on PUBLIK NEW SENSE .
